ovdesc.p: The application AA.SIMULATION.COMPARISON allows the user to compare through Simulation Comparison enquiry .The user can select maximum of three simulations id's only for comparison.

desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This field will hold the related simulation runner id for the respective arrangement.
Yes - Simulations will be considered for comparison
No - Simulations will not be considered for comparison
